subject: Big Pixi Update: Lock In Your Pricing Now!
description_text: Hi SIMSONN, We’re excited to share Pixi’s biggest update yet! As the first AI-powered invoicing app for Shopify, we’re now a fully AI-native editor—smarter and faster for you. This also comes with a pricing Update. Updates start September 15, but here’s your special deal: Current Users: Your plan and pricing stay unchanged. (Your current plan: ) Business Users: Free upgrade to the new Advanced plan! New Subscribers: Sign up or upgrade from Pro to Business now to lock in today’s rates. New features include refreshed templates, new integrations (e.g., Bundles apps, Customer accounts), and a smarter helpdesk. Thanks for being an early supporter: this wouldn’t be possible without you! Grateful as ever, Geon George Founder, Astral Commerce Unsubscribe
